title: Nine Inch Nails - The Downward Spiral : Live AVCHD
description:
Nine Inch Nails - The Downward Spiral : Live AVCHD

This is an AVCHD I made by muxing two different files: The 720p video from the m4v and the PCM audio from the dvd. I also added chapters.

Just burn the iso with imgburn and this AVCHD should play in any PS3 and in some blu-ray players.

Original video file:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5138278/Nine_Inch_Nails_-_The_Downward_Spiral___Live_%5BHD_720p_m4v%5D

Original audio file:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5134092/Nine_Inch_Nails_-_The_Downward_Spiral___Live_%5BDVD%5D

All the credits to:
thisoneisonus.org / theninhotline.net
